name: Recloose
description: '''Matthew "Recloose" Chicoine''' is an American electronic music producer, DJ and musician hailing from [[Detroit]], [[Michigan]], US. He is known for numerous releases on independent dance labels like [[Planet E Communications|Planet E]], Rush Hour, [[Peacefrog Records|Peacefrog]], [[Studio !K7]], [[Sonar Kollektiv]] and Delusions of Grandeur.  Chicoine is also a touring DJ who has played in and around Europe, the UK, the United States, Japan, China, Singapore, Indonesia, Brazil, Australia and New Zealand.
